title:
The <1>ecosystem
of <3>MoonRise turns technology into independence.
description: Each product was created with a purpose: to offer real infrastructure, direct control, and financial freedom. Everything interconnected, without relying on third parties.
moonchain: Proprietary blockchain. Lightweight, fast, and focused exclusively on financial applications. Ultra-low costs, fixed block time, and anti-fraud validation.
moonwallet: Multi-chain wallet with native integration to MoonChain. Automatic import, optimized fees, and advanced token control.
moonbuy: Direct MNR purchase system, connected to the pre-sale and strategic campaigns. No bureaucracy, straight to the point.
moonswap: Decentralized exchange integrated into the ecosystem. Fast swaps, smart liquidity, and direct connection to MoonWallet.
moonbank: Digital account integrated with MNR staking and financial control tools. Simple design, robust structure.
moonplus: Infrastructure for tokenization, trading, and custody of real-world assets. Buy and sell real estate, integrate with regulated brokers, and enjoy on-chain liquidity via MNR.
mnr: MoonRise's native token. The foundation of the entire infrastructure and economy â€” with burn mechanisms, abuse protection, and strategically controlled distribution.
